list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a numerical quantity that is not a whole number (e.g. 1/2, 0.5).
a small or tiny part, amount, or proportion of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he hesitated for a fraction of a second
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh do dự trong một phần của một giây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the portions into which a mixture may be separated by a process in which the individual components behave differently according to their physical properties.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the third fraction contain alcohols with boiling points of 120–130°C
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phân số thứ ba chứa cồn với điểm sôi 120-130 ° C

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in the Christian Church) the breaking of the Eucharistic bread.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Fraction may be accompanied by the Agnus Dei
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phân số có thể được kèm theo Agnus dei
